```{r,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(survival)
library(survminer)
library(MASS)
library(ggplot2)
```


clean the data
```{r,message=FALSE}
cancer_df=read_csv("Project_2_data.csv")|>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  drop_na()
  
col_names = 
  cancer_df |> select_if(is.character) |> colnames() |> as.vector()

cancer_df[,col_names] = 
  lapply(cancer_df[,col_names], factor) 

cancer_df = 
  cancer_df |> 
  mutate(
    status = 
      case_match(
        status,
        "Alive" ~ 0,
        "Dead" ~ 1)
  )
```


```{r}
model=coxph(Surv(survival_months,status)~.,data=cancer_df)

model=stepAIC(model)
```

```{r}
ggsurvplot(survfit(model,data=cancer_df), palette= '#2E9FDF',
           ggtheme = theme_minimal())
```
